item.description:
We will hike Thoreau Falls via Zealand Trail, which starts at the end of Zealand Road. The trail is 9.2 miles up and back with 500 feet of elevation, and a book time of 5 hours. We will travel Zealand trail, past Zealand Pond, to Ethan Pond trail, past the whitewall mountain, to Thoreau Falls.

Directions: From Concord NH: 93 North, exit 32 (route 3). Follow Rte 3 until it intersects with 302. Take a Right onto 302. Go straight for 2.2 miles, and turn right onto Zealand Rd. The parking area is at the end of Zealand Rd, 3.5 miles from 302.

This is a moderate hike because of distance. Please know your abilities and limits before signing up. Please pack to the conditions.

All participants are required to read and agree to the waiver and liability waiver posted on this site.
item.name: Thoreau Falls
